title: Kled, the Cantankerous Cavalier, available now

replies.body: When riot is strict on toxicity in league but the first sentence contains swears.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Swearing itself is fine. Directing it at others is not.

"Holy shit that was close!" is perfectly acceptable.
"You're shit at this game" is not.

It really isn't that difficult.
No that's actually not it. That's why there is a report option for inappropriate language.
The report option for inappropriate language is for people who talk like, "Fucking shit man, these %%%%%% pussies fucking rekt our virgin shit oozing anus"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hpigjnKl7nI
thank me later
holy shit captain obvious is here

Kled terrifies me. so much attack speed, and so much diving...

and yes i know servers are down but lets talk about something else.
ill talk about something else wit ya!

heres a kind of dumb idea: lets give champs pokemon types.

like {{champion:240}}  would be Dark/Fighting, {{champion:136}} would be Dragon/Psychic, {{champion:154}} would be Water/fighting

day 14: servers are still down... I've been waiting too long for kled and know they pull this. I'm running out of food and water. Won't last much longer... this might be my last entry. Goodbye.

Dear Hodgefelf,

On behalf of Riot, is it with great sorrow that I must inform you that doing so would be illegal and would result in them receiving a swift lawsuit and the loss of millions in copyright infringement.

I recommend using your imagination instead and pretend that Anivia and Kennen are actually Pokemon.

Sincerely,
A Sassy Player
